name: Dram Fireth
description:
Our studio of experimental archeology would like to present Dram Fireth
a game based on words that has been buried in ice for centuries

Keepeth t alive, mine own lief
bringeth m’re and warmeth up
nobody knoweth how bitter cold
the wint’r without fireth is
what freezing has’t i hath felt

Keepeth t alive, mine own lief
a dram fireth f’r thy hands
alloweth not t wend out
nev’r beest merit if ‘t be true
t’d did cost thee life

controls
arrows / wsad
space to use the axe
E to pick up & drop stuff
